doc:doc.doc:summary: An interface representing the functionality required to fetch the user's own avatar for an account.

doc:description.doc:para: Request that the user's avatar is downloaded from the service. This will cause the #Avatar::AvatarRetrieved signal to be fired when the avatar has been downloaded
This is the signal that will be fired when the avatar has been downloaded by the backend.

doc:doc.doc:summary: The local filename of the downloaded avatar image.
